text.base: A body lies in the center of the clearing, partially encased in a strange, translucent frost.
text.thermal: The body is encased in frost, but a deep heat signature is pulsing from the chest cavity. Core temp: 102.4Â°F.

lens.skeptic: It's a tragic casualty of the cold. A hiker who lost their way.
lens.believer: This is a Vessel. The frost is but a shell for the energy trapped within.
lens.haunted: The cold doesn't just bite here; it whispers. You can hear the static coming from the ice.

inserts.text: Your medical training screams at you: human bodies don't generate this much heat while frozen solid. It's impossible.
The ice is too regular. These are fractal patterns, not random freezing.

victim.description: The victim is frozen solid, yet feels... wrong.

ice_shards.description: Geometric shards of ice that seem to defy natural growth.
